widget.header: Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

config: Truck Accidents Center: We completed this new center to inform victims about everything related to legal compensation claims.
Probate Center: We finalized this new center to advise beneficiaries and executors about the rights and rules related to estates.
Personal Injury and Car Accidents Centers: We added informational boxes to these centers to present key issues in a more accessible way.
Law Student Resources: We have started compiling case outlines for the primary law school and bar exam subjects.
